text: Pure greed. The Reagors & Dykes families have more than enough money for a good life. Real estate, banking & more in marriage to the Cone fam. They won't suffer, unless they go to jail. They'll just have to live like us regular ppl. I resent that they've sullied Spike's legacy.
author: CounselorCarol1

text: More like acting a "part" than leadership. I learned this lesson many yrs ago in graduate school. Always grandstanding in discussions, but when it came to grades/quality research, they earned Ds. I always thought they were smarter than I was, until I saw their research papers.

text: RE #2020candidates: We have some who possess great rhetoric that unites the country & makes us feel good, but no ideas. And then, there are those that have no charisma, but they have great ideas to solve America's problems. That's the problem: We don't have BOTH.
author: CounselorCarol1

text: Service ppl do not communicate very well. Got an estimate yesterday for air duct cleaning. Technician shows up this morning and didn't even know I had 2 story house. Half of all disputes are over effective communication.
